snippet: The Fort Worth Star-Telegram reported that Echols-Luper was transferring to Arkansas State, and Frogs Coach Gary Patterson said the move would allow him to play quarterback.
abstract: Cameron Echols-Luper, receiver and kick returner at Texas Christian University, announces he has left school; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Fort Worth Star-Telegram reported that Echols-Luper was transferring to Arkansas State, and Frogs Coach Gary Patterson said the move would allow him to play quarterback.
